exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_O (sum_n _ 0) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of mult_one_l (mult one _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K Unable to unify "mult (sum_n_m u 0 0) a" with "sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) 0 0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of sum_Sn (sum_n _ (S _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of IHn (sum_n (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) n) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of sum_Sn (sum_n _ (S _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K n : nat IHn : sum_n (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) n = mult (sum_n u n) a Unable to unify "mult (sum_n_m u 0 (S n)) a" with "sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) 0 (S n)".

original: intros K a u n. induction n. - simpl. unfold sum_n. simpl. rewrite sum_O. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. unfold sum_n. simpl. rewrite sum_Sn. rewrite IHn. rewrite sum_Sn. reflexivity.
